posts.message:
I'm not delighted after i saw the new Google visual guidelines called material design, ridiculous name btw!, i feel it childish, cartoonish one!
specially the dull 3 new bottom buttons. i wonder how big companies like ms or google have disastrous design teams??! i admit that apple design guys are superior compared to those on both companies
كنت بحاول انزل Ubuntu ودى اول مره اجرب حاجة غير الويندز ، وتقريبآ الهارد اتفرمت ، هل فى طريقة ارجع بيها الداتا ؟

Just made an interesting discovery ... All the browsers abort checkbox checking if you clicked a link inside a label... Except IE for sure! Try it yourself

http://jsfiddle.net/YCL8t/

posts.message:
RT @DamianEdwards: The code from my @dnetconf SignalR talk is now at https://t.co/Ej9rsw4vaY
Video at http://t.co/Hwjd5xMdut
posts.caption: channel9.msdn.com
posts.description: SignalR is one of the latest additions to the ASP.NET web stack. It provides real-time HTTP support for your web applications, but the good news is that SignalR is useful outside of a web browse

posts.caption: www.infoq.com
posts.description: Peter Neubauer introduces Graph databases and how they compare to RDBMS' and where they stand in the NOSQL-movement, followed by examples of using a graph database in Java with Neo4j.

posts.message: In case you finished watching all NDC conference videos (I know I didn't), and / or want more videos, check out the DotNetConf videos now available on Channel 9
